## Introduction
 
As a system administrator, keeping your servers up and running is of utmost importance. Server downtime can lead to lost revenue, decreased productivity, and even damage to your reputation. That's why having a reliable server monitoring tool is essential. One such tool is Simple Server Monitor.
 
## What is Simple Server Monitor?
 
Simple Server Monitor is a lightweight yet powerful tool for monitoring the performance, availability, and uptime of your servers. With this software, you can easily track the health of your servers and take action before issues escalate into downtime.
 
## Features
 
### Alerts
 
Simple Server Monitor allows you to set up alerts for various conditions, such as CPU usage exceeding a certain threshold or a server being offline for a certain amount of time. You can receive alerts via email, text message, or even execute a script to take automated action.
 
### Performance Monitoring
 
This software also allows you to monitor performance metrics, such as CPU usage, memory usage, disk usage, and network traffic. This data can help you diagnose issues and optimize server performance.
 
### Uptime Monitoring
 
Simple Server Monitor can also monitor server uptime and provide detailed reports on the availability of your servers. This information can be valuable for ensuring service level agreements (SLAs) are being met and identifying trends in server uptime.
 
### Customizable Dashboards
 
The software features customizable dashboards, allowing you to view the information that is most relevant to you. You can also create custom reports to share with other members of your team.
 
## Pricing
 
Simple Server Monitor offers several pricing plans, including a free trial. Prices start at $119.99 for a single server license and go up to $899.99 for a 50 server license.
 
## Conclusion
 
Simple Server Monitor is a powerful tool for system administrators who need to ensure the performance, availability, and uptime of their servers. With its alerts, performance monitoring, and uptime monitoring features, it can help you proactively identify and resolve issues before they cause downtime. Its customizable dashboards and reports make it easy to view the information that is most important to you. Overall, Simple Server Monitor is a great investment for any business that relies on server uptime.
